statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews;
SELECT review_id, user_id, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT content FROM feedback_reviews WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT review_id, user_id, rating, date_posted FROM feedback_reviews WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, content, rating, date_posted FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE user_id = 101 AND rating < 5;
SELECT review_id, content FROM feedback_reviews WHERE user_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY rating DESC, date_posted ASC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM feedback_reviews WHERE date_posted BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM feedback_reviews GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3 ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT content, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, content, timestamp FROM feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM feedback;
SELECT review_id, review_content, approval_status FROM reviews WHERE approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT feedback_id,content,rating FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 101 AND rating < 4
SELECT f.feedback_id,r.review_id FROM feedback f JOIN reviews r ON f.feedback_id = r.feedback_id WHERE r.approval_status = true
SELECT user_id,count(feedback_id) as total_feedbacks FROM feedback GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC
SELECT f.content,r.review_content FROM feedback f LEFT JOIN reviews r ON f.feedback_id = r.feedback_id WHERE r.review_content IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT user_id, content FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT content, rating FROM feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE first_name = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, email, date_joined FROM users ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE date_joined BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY username;
SELECT review_content, helpful FROM reviews JOIN feedback ON reviews.feedback_id = feedback.feedback_id WHERE feedback.rating < 3 AND reviews.helpful = true;
SELECT feedback_id, content FROM feedback JOIN users ON feedback.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.first_name = 'John' AND feedback.timestamp > NOW();
SELECT user_id, COUNT(review_id) AS num_reviews FROM reviews GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(review_id) > 2 ORDER BY num_reviews DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT title, url FROM digital_literacy_content WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE helpful = true AND created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT content FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 123 AND rating = 5;
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_content WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(review_id) AS num_reviews FROM reviews GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_reviews > 2;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM reviews WHERE helpful = true;
SELECT title, author FROM content WHERE category = 'technology';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM categories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT content_id, title, author FROM content WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY title;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM reviews GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT u.username, c.name FROM users u JOIN categories c ON u.user_id = c.user_id;
SELECT feedback_id, content, rating FROM feedback WHERE content LIKE '%great%' OR content LIKE '%excellent%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
